meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Cindy Vanderbur Mike Garrett Dan Adkison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6361.

td.p: Cindy Vanderbur, a health insurance contract specialist from Madison, Indiana
Mike Garrett, a magazine editor from Kamloops, British Columbia
Dan Adkison, a copy editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 3-day cash winnings total $37,400)

tr.td: GREG-CELLENT!
BOOK LEARNIN'
BIG (& NOT-SO-BIG) BIRD
FIVE FINGER EXERCISE
I LOVE PARIS
IN THE "SPRING" TIME

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Gregory is the first name of this cranky TV doctor, a specialist in infectious diseases')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Gregory is the first name of this cranky TV doctor, a specialist in infectious diseases

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Mike: What\'s an appendix?)

a bibliography

DanMike
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_4', 'clue_J_4_4_stuck', '(Dan: What is Thinky?)
(Alex: [*]. Yes. No. And I gave the correct response. I thought he said, [*]. What did you say?)
(Dan: I said, "Thinky".)
(Alex: "Thinky"?)
[Dan laughs.]
(Alex: Oh. I\'ve never even heard of that one.)

Pinky

Dan
Triple Stumper
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
